ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Wonderland: Asylum
ComicInfo.Summary:
It's all been leading toward this. The current Mad Hatter has led an epic assault against Violet Liddle... but little does Hatter know that Violet has a twisted trick up her sleeve. As the truth of the Asylum is revealed, Violet Liddle will face her final fate at the hands of the Mad Hatter.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | David Nakayama | 1 | B | Cover B | Christopher Cote | 2 | C | Cover C | Chris Ehnot & David Delanty | 3 | D | Cover D | Vinz El Tabanas | 4 |
